TABLE.NAME: course_renamed
TABLE.COMMENT: This table helps keep tracking of the courses already backed up in case something fails.

FIELD.NAME: task_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The task id associated with this course renamed process.

FIELD.NAME: course_id
FIELD.COMMENT: The current Course Id that this particular course has.

FIELD.NAME: course_id_number
FIELD.COMMENT: The current Course IdNumber that this particular course has.

FIELD.NAME: new_course_id_number
FIELD.COMMENT: The Course IdNumber that must be set for this particular course.

FIELD.NAME: new_course_short_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The new Course Short Name that must be set for this particular course.

FIELD.NAME: new_course_start_date
FIELD.COMMENT: The new Course Start Date that must be set for this particular course.

FIELD.NAME: new_course_end_date
FIELD.COMMENT: The new Course End Date that must be set for this particular course.

FIELD.NAME: renamed
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicate whether this course has been renamed or not.

FIELD.NAME: user_id
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the id of the user who start this courses info modification.

FIELD.NAME: user_fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: This field holds the name of the user who start this courses info modification.

FIELD.NAME: created_date
FIELD.COMMENT: The date when this course was set to be renamed.

INDEX.NAME: course_renamed_ux_course_id
INDEX.COMMENT: Index for the course id and task id fields to guarantee its uniqueness.
